author: Julia Kotwicka
title: Enemy aviation launches air defense systems in Sumy and Zaporizhzhia regions | УНН
text: Enemy aviation launches air defense systems in Sumy and Zaporizhzhia regions Kyiv • UNN The Air Force of the Ukrainian Armed Forces reported the launch of guided bombs by enemy tactical aircraft in Sumy and Zaporizhzhia regions. Air alert has been declared in these regions. The enemy tactical aircraft launched the anti-aircraft missiles in Sumy and Zaporizhzhia regions. This is reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, UNN reports. Add An air alert has been declared in Sumy and Zaporizhzhia regions . author: Corriere delle Alpi
title: Famiglie, amici, allenatori e strutture: «Belluno e il suo territorio, ambiente ideale per i piccoli atleti» - Corriere delle Alpi
text: Famiglie, amici, allenatori e strutture: «Belluno e il suo territorio, ambiente ideale per i piccoli atleti» Oltre Sport Business Forum: la Fondazione Dmo Dolomiti Bellunesi vede nella diffusione dello sport di base un’ulteriore leva per la promozione turistica del territorioGianluca Da Poian La Fondazione DMO Dolomiti Bellunesi - ente ufficiale dedicato alla governance e alla promozione turistica della provincia di Belluno - ha creduto fin dal primo momento nell’importanza dello Sport Business Forum e del binomio industria, da una parte, e sport-turismo dall’altra. I motivi per i quali lavorare in questa direzione sono molteplici e si basano su dati reali e proiezioni di ciò che accadrà nei prossimi anni. «L’evento valorizza Belluno e il Bellunese che per quattro giorni sarà al centro dei racconti di economia dello sport», sottolinea la Direttrice della DMO Dolomiti Bellunesi, Valentina Colleselli. «Le eccellenze coinvolte garantiranno un elevato valore di dibattito, confronto e arricchimento. Un’occasione per il territorio e per tutti quelli che sceglieranno di essere presenti. Per tale motivo, abbiamo deciso di contribuire attivamente con il nostro staff e i nostri spazi per accogliere coloro che parteciperanno. Auspichiamo sia solo il primo di molteplici eventi attraverso i quali comunicare al meglio il nostro senso di comunità e di accoglienza, nonché promuovere la nostra destinazione». «Il turismo genera economia», evidenzia la responsabile marketing della Fondazione, Elisa Calcamuggi. «Parliamo di un comparto trainante dell’economia mondiale, pari al 10% del Pil. E in futuro questi dati andranno incrementando. Stando a uno studio di McKinsey, entro il 2030 i viaggi nazionali cresceranno del 3% annuo, con un consuntivo di 19 miliardi di pernottamenti, mentre i viaggi internazionali potranno generare 9 miliardi di pernottamenti. Come DMO guardiamo soprattutto al turismo outdoor che rappresenta un modo di vivere il territorio incentrato sul contatto con la natura e lo sport». Ciò permette di valorizzare i professionisti sui quali il territorio può contare. Le Dolomiti Bellunesi rendono lo sport un’esperienza unica grazie a guide alpine e naturalistiche, maestri di sci e degli altri sport, accompagnatori di media montagna e così via. Professionalità che sono una sicurezza per la conoscenza del territorio e per la possibilità di far vivere agli ospiti un momento indimenticabile costruito su misura. Nel sito [www.visitdolomitibellunesi.com](http://www.visitdolomitibellunesi.com) gli operatori possono poi promuovere e commercializzare le loro attività. I percorsi degli atleti «Il portale è una vetrina per tutti coloro i quali operano nell’area delle Dolomiti Bellunesi», spiega Stefano Casagrande che cura per la DMO Dolomiti Bellunesi l’area digital. Nel considerare vincente il binomio sport-industria non va dimenticato il valore delle eccellenze sportive. Se da un lato lo Sport Business Forum permetterà di ascoltare storie, aneddoti e suggerimenti da parte dei campioni di ieri e oggi provenienti da tutta Italia, è giusto ricordare come in provincia di Belluno ci siano atleti di valore che hanno costruito un percorso importante. La DMO vede in loro un messaggio ulteriore di promozione. «Emergere nello sport significa poter contare su un ambiente di valore a 360 gradi. Famiglia, amici, allenatori, tutto contribuisce al successo», aggiunge Elisa Calcamuggi. Alcuni esempi? «Il progetto giovani di Fondazione Cortina che supporta 14 ragazzi e ragazze veneti nel loro percorso di crescita, ma anche Dolomiti Bellunesi calcio, lo Ski College di Falcade che ha cresciuto Elia Barp e Lucia Dalmasso, il Valbelluna Freeski vivaio di eccellenza da cui è uscito Leonardo Donaggio. Senza dimenticare le due ruote con Giada Specia, Virginia Iaccarino e Andrea Pietrobon, il Belluno Volley di A3 maschile, l’hockey, la ginnastica. E sicuramente avrò dimenticato qualcuno». Una chiara strategia Nel bellunese ci sono appuntamenti di respiro internazionale, nonché eventi meno famosi che attraggono comunque sul territorio migliaia di appassionati che arrivano da tutto il mondo per gareggiare qui. La Fondazione è consapevole che debbano essere inseriti in una chiara strategia per compiere il salto di qualità. Con questa finalità è stata studiata la tavola rotonda in cui interverranno l’ex ciclista Davide Cassani (presidente APT Emilia Romagna), Pietro Federico Delaini (ad Bella Italia), Stefania Demetz (autrice, esperta di eventi sportivi, già direttrice Coppa del Mondo di Sci in Val Gardena) e Patrick Romano (direttore generale DMO Bologna Welcome). L’appuntamento è per sabato 14 alle ore 15 a Palazzo Fulcis.

author: AB Newswire
title: Zcet Has Been Recognized As A National High-Tech Enterprise In 2023 | Markets | bigspringherald.com
text:
Zhongce E.T Electronics Co.,Ltd. （ZCET）is honored to have been recognized as a National High-tech Enterprise in the first batch of reviews for 2023. This achievement is a testament to the company’s dedication to technological innovation and marks a significant milestone in its ongoing development.
The National High-tech Enterprise certification is jointly issued by the Ministry of Science and Technology, the Ministry of Finance, the State Taxation Administration, the General Administration of Customs, and the State Administration of Foreign Exchange. It serves to commend enterprises that meet the national standards for high-tech enterprise recognition and provides them with benefits such as tax incentives and research funding support.
As a specialized manufacturer engaged in the design and production of control power transformers , reactors, power devices, and inductors, ZCET has always been committed to product innovation and technological research and development. This recognition as a National High-tech Enterprise not only acknowledges the company’s relentless efforts in technology R&D and innovation but also highlights its remarkable achievements in corporate management, talent development, and technological innovation.
It is worth mentioning that ZCET relentlessly pursues independent research and development as well as independent innovation. The company boasts a highly qualified research team, well-structured personnel, and ample R&D funds, all dedicated to providing customers with higher quality products and services.
The certification as a National High-tech Enterprise further strengthens ZCET’s advantages in innovation and technology, propelling the company’s continued growth and enabling it to deliver even higher quality products and services to its customers. Moreover, ZCET’s accomplishment contributes significantly to the development of the industrial control transformers industry in China and beyond.

author: Redacción
title: Luis Petri encabezó el primer cambio de guardia de los tres regimientos: "Nos sentimos orgullosos de nuestras Fuerzas Armadas"
text: El Ministro de Defensa, [Luis Petri](https://www.elobservador.com.uy/nota/luis-petri-elevo-un-pedido-para-que-argentina-sea-socio-global-de-la-otan-2024418114113), encabezó un inédito acto junto a las Fuerzas Armadas este sábado 4 en Plaza de Mayo. Se trató del primer cambio de guardia que realizan tres regimientos históricos del país: Patricios, Iriarte y Granaderos. Además, el funcionario anunció que, a partir de ahora, este cambio de guardia se realizará de manera pública el primer sábado de cada mes en el mismo sitio. En dicho acto, Petri estuvo acompañado por [su esposa, la periodista Cristina Pérez](https://www.elobservador.com.uy/nota/la-periodista-cristina-perez-pareja-del-ministro-luis-petri-revelo-por-que-no-quiere-ser-madre-2024412181145); el general Xavier Julián Isaac, jefe del Estado Mayor Conjunto de las Fuerzas Armadas; el titular de la Fuerza Aérea, Fernando Luis Mengo; el titular del Ejército Carlos Alberto Presti, general de brigada, y, por la Fuerza Armada, contralmirante Carlos María Allievi. Para Petri, la ceremonia que tuvo lugar este sábado "no tiene precedentes" y que está vinculada con la "reinvidicación" de las Fuerzas, que desde su cartera como desde el Ejecutivo, se quiere realizar. “Es una tradición que estamos recuperando y le estamos dando un contenido histórico muy importante. Es hacer memoria, es reivindicar el rol de nuestras Fuerzas Armadas. A su vez es un evento cultural muy importante y necesario que la ciudadanía estaba reclamando hace muchísimo tiempo", aseguró. Los regimientos que llevaron a cabo este cambio de guardia tienen una importancia vital en nuestra país. Mientras los Granaderos, poseen a su cargo la custodia de la Casa Rosada y de la Catedral; los Patricios se encargan del Cabildo; y, por último, el Regimiento Iriarte hacen lo propio con el Edificio Libertador. El mensaje de Luis Petri tras el histórico cambio de guardia de los tres regimientos Luego de la ceremonia, que contó con la participación de más de 130 jóvenes uniformados, el ministro Luis Petri, utilizó sus redes sociales para reafirmar el compromiso que tiene el Gobierno Nacional con las Fuerzas Armadas y, así enaltecer la función que poseen para con la República Argentina. "Amor a la Patria y mucha emoción en este primer cambio de guardia de los tres regimientos históricos, con el cariño de la gente que tan merecido tienen!", expresó al comienzo de su mensaje. Y continuó: "Junto al Presidente @JMilei y todos los que formamos su gobierno nos sentimos orgullosos de nuestras Fuerzas Armadas y sus regimientos de Granaderos, Patricios e Iriarte que tanto hicieron y hacen por la libertad e independencia de la Patria!". Amor a la Patria y mucha emoción en este primer cambio de guardia de los tres regimientos históricos, con el cariño de la gente que tan merecido tienen!— Luis Petri (@luispetri) Junto al Presidente [@JMilei]y todos los que formamos su gobierno nos sentimos orgullosos de nuestras Fuerzas Armadas y sus… [pic.twitter.com/2cnn8agCfB] [May 4, 2024] Asimismo, fue por este medio también a través del cual informó la novedad del cambio de guardia, que pasará a ser público. "El primer sábado de cada mes vamos realizar este cambio de guardia histórico para que puedan acompañarlo y celebrarlo todos los argentinos!", finalizó. Esta medida tiene como objetivo acercar a los ciudadanos argentinos tanto a los regimientos como a las Fuerzas Armadas y a las tareas que realizan durante todo el año. De hecho, el acto de este sábado, contó con la asistencia de decenas de personas que se reunieron en Plaza de Mayo y en los balcones del Cabildo para presenciar toda la ceremonia en su conjunto con la música de la banda militar Tambor de Tacuarí del Regimiento Infantería 1 Patricios. También desde el propio Ministerio se mostraron satisfechos con el acto oficial y con la presencia del pueblo. "Hoy, en el corazón de Plaza de Mayo, vivimos un momento único junto a Granaderos, Patricios, Iriarte y toda la gente que se acercó a compartir esta ceremonia llena de emoción y patriotismo", concluyeron.

author: Gilmore Leaño
title: OFW deployment up 18 percent
text: OFW deployment up 18 percent The deployment of overseas Filipino workers from January to early December reached an all-time high of 2.4 million, according to the Department of Migrant Workers. The figure represents an 18 percent increase from 2022 deployment data. DMW Officer-in-Charge Hans Leo Cacdac said about 608,000 sea-based workers were deployed compared to last year’s 554,000, while 491,000 land-based workers were deployed compared to last year’s 411,820. “The number of seafarers rose initially, reaching 608,000 compared to 554,000 overseas certificates distributed for the sea-based workers. For land-based workers, the figures increased to 491,000 from 411,820,” Cacdac said. “The increase to 608,000 is particularly noteworthy, as it marks the first time we’ve issued such a high number for the sea-based sector. It’s evident that 2023 was the year when global economies began to open up, along with world trade, marking our transition into a post-pandemic era,” he added. The shift, the DMW official said, signifies the opening of economies, job markets, and global trade, with seafarers playing a pivotal role. The DMW said it is anticipating an improved economic climate for 2024, with more job opportunities for Filipinos. “We are anticipating an improved economic climate for 2024. This year, our expectations are higher for openings, especially as we focus on Saudi Arabia, where major development projects align with their vision for 2030,” Cacdac said. DMW Undersecretary for Policy and International Cooperation Patricia Yvonne Caunan said that the department has pending bilateral labor agreements with 25 countries. “Currently, within the department, we have 38 pending bilateral labor agreements and memoranda of understanding with 25 countries in our pipeline. Of these, 18 are from Europe and the Americas, 16 from the Middle East and Africa, and four from Asia and the Pacific,” Caunan said. She added that the department successfully established the Japan Desk to safeguard the welfare of the OFWs in that country. “The purpose behind this desk is not only to continuously safeguard the welfare of OFWs in Japan but also to ensure, in their own words, that we regain our position as the number one choice in Japan,” the DMW official said. Read more Daily Tribune stories at: [https://tribune.net.ph/](https://tribune.net.ph) Follow us on social media Facebook, X, Instagram & Threads: [@tribunephl](https://www.facebook.com/tribunephl) Youtube: [TribuneNow](https://www.youtube.com/c/TribuneNOW) TikTok: [@dailytribuneofficial]( https://www.tiktok.com/@dailytribuneofficial)

author: EFE
title: Carlos Alcaraz y el emotivo mensaje que envió a Rafael Nadal
text:
Carlos Alcaraz llegó a Melbourne para iniciar la cuenta atrás hacia el Abierto de Australia , primer Grand Slam de la temporada, casi al tiempo que se dio a conocer la baja por lesión de Rafael Nadal . Alcaraz , número dos del mundo, partió el sábado desde España a la ciudad australiana. Tras enterarse de la ausencia definitiva de su compatriota, con quien lleva tiempo sin coincidir en una competición, le envió un mensaje de ánimo .
"¡Te esperamos en el próximo torneo, Rafa ! Recupérate pronto!", escribió Alcaraz en Instagram.
Lee también Rafael Nadal no jugará el Abierto de Australia; este es el principal motivo
Carlos Alcaraz jugará por tercera vez en su carrera el primer Grand Slam de la temporada. Nunca pasó los dieciseisavos de final, la tercera ronda, que obtuvo en 2022, superado por el italiano Matteo Berrettini.
"Te echaremos de menos en Melbourne , Rafa. Te enviamos todo nuestro cariño y nuestros mejores deseos para una pronta recuperación. Nos vemos pronto en la cancha", expresó la organización del Abierto de Australia en sus redes sociales tras conocer la baja del balear.
También el australiano Nick Kyrgios mostró su apoyo a Nadal : "Siento lo que está pasando Rafa . Mejorate pronto, ese era el miedo para mí también, volver demasiado pronto..."
Nadal , que reapareció en Brisbane la semana pasada después de casi un año apartado de las pistas por una lesión en el psoas ilíaco de la pierna izquierda, sintió molestias en la zona dañada tras jugar ante Thompson, que se impuso al ganador de veintidós grandes en un partido resuelto en tres sets y que duró más de tres horas.
Excampeón del mundo ve "altamente improbable" que Checo Pérez continúe en Red Bull para 2025

title: 12 Amazing 8GB DDR3 Desktop RAM For 2023 | Robots.net

Overall, this RAM module is a great investment to enhance your desktop’s capabilities and extend its lifespan. Buyer's Guide: 8GB DDR3 Desktop RAM 1. Determine your computer's compatibility - Check your computer's motherboard specifications to ensure it supports DDR3 RAM modules. - Verify the maximum capacity of RAM that your motherboard can accommodate. 2. Consider your computer's current RAM configuration - Check the existing RAM configuration in your computer to ensure compatibility. - Note the number of RAM slots available for upgrades. 3. Determine the RAM speed and latency - Choose a RAM module with a speed compatible with your motherboard. - Consider the CAS latency (CL) of the RAM module, as lower latency can result in better performance. 4. Assess your computing needs - Determine the purpose of your computer usage, such as gaming, multimedia editing, or general tasks. - Identify if your computing demands require additional RAM for smooth performance. 5. Opt for reputable brands and sellers - Research and choose well-known brands for assurance of quality and compatibility. - Purchase RAM modules from trustworthy sellers to avoid counterfeit or defective products. 6. Consider the warranty and return policy - Check the warranty duration provided by the manufacturer. - Review the seller's return policy in case you encounter any issues with the purchased RAM. 7. Read reviews and customer feedback - Visit reliable websites or forums to read reviews from users who have purchased the specific RAM module you are considering. - Take note of any recurring praises or criticisms to make an informed decision. 8. Compare prices and offers - Look for competitive prices from various sellers to find the best deal. - Consider additional offers or promotions, such as bundled software or discounts, while comparing prices. Frequently Asked Questions about 12 Amazing 8GB DDR3 Desktop RAM For 2023 No, DDR3 RAM is not compatible with DDR4 motherboards. They operate using different technologies and have different physical layouts. It depends on your specific usage. If you frequently work with memory-intensive tasks, such as video editing or gaming, having more RAM is generally better. However, if you primarily perform everyday tasks, such as web browsing and word processing, faster RAM may provide a noticeable performance boost. While it is typically possible to mix different brands of RAM, it is generally recommended to use RAM modules from the same brand and series to ensure optimal compatibility and stability. Mixing different brands can sometimes lead to compatibility issues. Mixing different sizes of RAM modules is possible, but it is important to note that it can affect your computer’s performance. For optimal results, it is recommended to use RAM modules of the same size and preferably with the same specifications. No, you cannot install more RAM than the maximum limit specified by your motherboard. The motherboard has a set limit for the maximum RAM capacity it can support, and exceeding this limit may result in compatibility issues and potential damage to the system. Always adhere to the specified limits outlined by your motherboard’s manufacturer.

author: 小浪财讯
title: 中证A500ETF（159338）跌0.84%，半日成交额12.26亿元_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，中证A500ETF（159338）跌0.84%，报0.939元，成交额12.26亿元。中证A500ETF（159338）重仓股方面， 贵州茅台 截止午盘涨0.00%， 宁德时代 跌1.13%， 中国平安 跌0.93%， 招商银行 跌0.70%， 美的集团 跌0.65%， 长江电力 跌0.33%， 比亚迪 跌1.40%， 兴业银行 跌0.08%， 紫金矿业 跌1.44%， 东方财富 跌2.19%。
中证A500ETF（159338）业绩比较基准为 中证A500指数 收益率，管理人为国泰基金管理有限公司，基金经理为黄岳，成立（2024-09-26）以来回报为-5.30%，近一个月回报为-0.05%。
风险提示：市场有风险，投资需谨慎。本文为AI大模型自动发布，任何在本文出现的信息（包括但不限于个股、评论、预测、图表、指标、理论、任何形式的表述等）均只作为参考，不构成个人投资建议。

author: AFP
title: Musk's misleading election posts viewed 1.2 billion times: study - Breitbart
text: False or misleading US election claims posted on X by Elon Musk have amassed nearly 1.2 billion views this year, a watchdog reported Thursday, highlighting the billionaire’s potential influence on the highly polarized White House race. Ahead of the November election, researchers have raised alarm that X, formerly Twitter, is a hotbed of political misinformation. They have also flagged that Musk, who purchased the platform in 2022 and is a vocal backer of Donald Trump, appears to be swaying voters by spreading falsehoods on his personal account. Researchers from the Center for Countering Digital Hate (CCDH) identified 50 posts since January by Musk –- who has more than 193 million followers on the social media site — with election claims debunked by independent fact-checkers. None of the posts displayed a “Community Note,” a crowd-sourced moderation tool that X has promoted as the way for users to add context to posts, CCDH said, raising questions about its effectiveness to combat falsehoods. “Elon Musk is abusing his privileged position as owner of a… politically influential social media platform to sow disinformation that generates discord and distrust,” warned CCDH chief executive Imran Ahmed. “The lack of Community Notes on these posts shows that his business is failing woefully to contain the kind of algorithmically-boosted incitement that we all know can lead to real-world violence.” The posts analyzed by CCDH carried widely debunked claims, such as that Democrats are encouraging illegal migration with the aim of “importing voters” or that the election is vulnerable to fraud. Both claims amassed hundreds of millions of views. Last week, Musk faced a firehose of criticism for sharing with his followers an AI deepfake video featuring Trump’s Democratic rival, Vice President Kamala Harris. In it, a voiceover mimicking Harris calls President Joe Biden senile before declaring that she does not “know the first thing about running the country.” The video, viewed by millions, carried no indication that it was parody — save for a laughing emoji. Only later did Musk clarify that the video was meant as satire. “Musk behaves as if he is beyond reproach despite growing evidence of the harmful role he is personally playing to fuel disinformation and division ahead of the US elections,” Nora Benavidez, from the advocacy group Free Press Action Fund, told AFP. “As his behavior edges closer to election interference, it’s up to others — the public, regulatory agencies and advertisers — to hold him accountable for his anti-democratic behavior.” Musk, who purchased the platform in 2022 for $44 billion, is facing growing scrutiny over his potential influence on voters. On Monday, a bipartisan group of five US secretaries of state sent an open letter to Musk, urging him to fix X’s AI chatbot known as Grok after it produced election misinformation. Hours after Biden stepped down from the presidential race last month and endorsed Harris as the Democratic nominee, Grok churned out false information about ballot deadlines, which was amplified by other platforms. X — which also faced criticism for stoking tensions during recent far-right riots across England — has gutted trust and safety teams and scaled back content moderation efforts once used to tame misinformation, making it what researchers call a haven for disinformation. X did not respond to an AFP request for comment.
